txt.en: The láthbears have become disturbed by your actions in their territory and have become more active in seeking intruders. The disturbed láthbears must be defeated before they turn their aggressions towards the crofters on the outskirts of Faldham.
The disturbed láthbears were unable to injure any of the people of Faldham in their aggression, due to your efforts to defeat them.

The láthbears have become disturbed by your actions in their territory and have become more active in seeking intruders. The disturbed láthbears must be defeated before they turn their aggressions towards the crofters on the outskirts of Faldham.
The disturbed láthbears can be found in the woods east of Faldham.\n\nThe disturbed láthbears have grown more aggressive and must be defeated before they can expand towards the village of Faldham.
The disturbed láthbears were unable to harm the people of Faldham in their aggression, due to your efforts in defeating them.
